issue.title: wealthsimple.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://wealthsimple.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwealthsimple.com)
### Comment
> When I have AdGuard DNS enabled, the Notifications screen and the Rewards screen don't work. They just sit there loading. I was wondering why they didn't work for months until it finally occurred to me to try it with the default DNS settings, and lo and behold, they work. 
Username: `@theRealPadster`

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8puweuwjp94wc8k8c0cwowgo8wg4cg0kjqus3gqn9s.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bxwfkuag8g8488g00kgcosg8g8oo4oo8zxnbjgc76c.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Pixel 2 Android Phone
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Family Protection server
System version: | Android 11
Browser: | Wealthsimple *app* notifications or rewards pages

comment.body:
> Hmm. Could you please check with VPN, which allows to select DNS or with another ISP? If supported only unencrypted DNS - use 94.140.14.140.

The private DNS settings only allow for a hostname, the IP address doesn't work. 

As far as VPN when I go to add a new VPN it has all these options that I'm not sure what to do with. 
[Screenshot_20241119-193627](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9a031dcb-bf90-4512-99a5-025cb664d270)

Or do you mean the Adguard VPN app? I installed it to test but it looks like it requires an account to use and I don't want to create an account just to use the public DNS servers.

issue.title: www.dogdrip.net

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.
